attributes.action: Stop Police officers treating football fans as scum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign my petition as i want to highlight some of the treatment that we the average football fans recives from the police, it may because of where we are from, may because of how we ress but the disgusting treatment of young football fans needs to stop now! Please take a stand by writing a letter to your local newspaper, member of parlement or police force.

rejection.details:
What specifically do you want the Prime Minister to do?
Please use a full name when submitting petitions.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
